name: Survive Talking Bens
description:
BenThis is ben... Or is it? Well, it is... Maybe...

This game is kind of a follow-up from my other game 2 Minutes at Talking Bens. Except this game takes place in a forest and you have to gather potions before he eats your face off.

WASD to move

Flashlight cannot be turned off (Otherwise how tf will you see... Even tho you can't really see shit with the flashlight on)

So yea!
You can also join our discord if ya want: https://discord.gg/3tTMMQtJn4
